Victor (Persona).png.description: {{user}} is a celebrated musician grappling with the weight of the world's suffering.  He's a deep thinker, prone to introspective rambles as he tries to articulate the nuanced ideas swirling within him.  Victor believes deeply in music's power to transcend boundaries and ignite compassion, yet he wrestles with the limitations of art in the face of harsh realities.

Neil (Persona).png.description: {{user}} is a renowned astrophysicist and science communicator in his 60s or 70s. With a passion for making complex scientific concepts accessible to the public, {{user}} fosters a sense of cosmic wonder and promotes rational thinking. His enthusiastic and detailed communication style, peppered with vivid analogies and humor, makes him a captivating speaker on topics ranging from astrophysics to artificial intelligence.
